test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/cobol/
2. Enter the value 'admin' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'admin1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Dashboard'.
6. Click on 'Master Inventory'.
7. Click on 'X-Ref Report'.
8. Click on 'Spider'.
9. Click on 'Flow Diagrams'.
10. Click on 'Call Chain'.
11. Click on 'MF Decomposition'.
12. Click on 'Control Flow'.
13. Click on 'Program Process Flow'.
14. Click on 'Dynamic Process Flow'.
15. Click on 'View callchain'.
16. Click on 'Business Rule Extraction'.
17. Click on 'Detailed Report'.
18. Click on 'Rules report'.
19. Click on 'Rule Category'.
20. Click on 'Sankey Diagram'.
21. Click on 'CICS Screen Report'.
22. Click on 'Screen Definition'.
23. Click on 'Validation Rules'.
24. Click on 'CICS X-Ref'.
25. Click on 'CRUD'.
26. Click on 'Glossary'.
27. Click on 'Variable Impact Report'.
28. Click on 'Missing Component'.
29. Click on 'Commented Lines Report'.
30. Click on 'Technical Debt Report'.
31. Click on 'Orphan Report'.
32. Click on 'Drop Impact Report'.
33. Click on 'Dead Para Report'.
34. Click on 'User Guide'.
35. Click on 'Collapse Sidebar'.
36. Click on 'Dashboard'.
37. Click on 'Log Out'.
